p: In a scenario in which the emissions of greenhouse gases stabilize (RCP 4.5), the FPH of M. harttii represents a suitable area corresponding to 39.3% of the CPH ( Fig 3; Table 2) (). The sites northwards of the São Francisco River have a smaller suitable area (1.1%) ( Fig 3A and 3B; Table 2), while the largest areas of adequacy are concentrated southwards of the São Francisco River (98.9%) ( Fig 3C and 3D; Table 2). The AICc ( S4 Appendix) and AUCratio ( S5 Appendix) of the model were 0 and 1.720858124, respectively.
